title: Student special! Renovated 3 bed near BC campus and public transit
posting_body: Check out this updated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment located within walking distance of BC campus and MBTA T line
Kitchen is brand new with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including microwave.
Hardwood floors through the living space and all brand new carpet in the bedrooms.
Rooms are all good size with closets, one with master bathroom with shower.
One bedroom is oversized with larger closet and could fit two beds.
Rent includes heat and hot water plus washer and dryer in unit!
This apartment is in a great neighborhood close to Cleveland Circle and Boston College campus.
You can walk to 3 T lines, 1 bus line with access to Harvard/Red line and the BC shuttle bus.
There are 5 restaurants, two convenience stores and a great coffee shop with wifi all located within 5 minute walk.
